topics.body:
In political news "obamacare" was upheld as legal 6-3 and people are throwing shitfits cause what the justices wrote essentially ended the legal drama about it cause from a legal standpoint it's 100% legal now.  If they want to repeal it they would have to go through congress and the president.

Also housing anti-discrimination was upheld.

Chances are gay marriage is going to be legalized Monday.



I have a feeling my brother is furious right now from the news.

[spoiler]This ship fight is a motherfucker.[/spoiler]
